name: Tab Height Mod for +1
description:
for +1 http://aaron-a-arts.deviantart.com/art/1-UPDATED-11-12-268398605 a Windows 7 theme.

this is a slimmed down version of "Tabs Bar Minimal Size David McRitchie". 

if you use a Windows 7 theme that has a solid border and toolbar that pops up over the top of your Firefox Toolbar this will easily adjust tab height effectively moving your toolbar up or down.
